text: The Y-14 Women Foil bracket is LIVE and these young fencers are bringing serious energy to the piste! Who's going to take home the gold in this lightning-fast competition?
What a nail-biter in Y-14 Women's Foil Pool 4! The winner came out swinging with a dominant 22-15 performance, while that 16-15 match went down to the wire—fencing at its finest! 🤺
